columns.Book_ID: The unique identifier for each book.
columns.Title: The title of the book.
columns.Type: The genre or category of the book.
columns.Pages: The total number of pages in the book.
columns.Chapters: The total number of chapters in the book.
columns.Audio: The duration of the book in audio format.
columns.Release: The publication date of the book.

book.table_description: The table stores information about various books.

columns.Review_ID: The unique identifier for each review.
columns.Book_ID: The identifier for the associated book.
columns.Rating: The rating given to the book on a scale.
columns.Readers_in_Million: The estimated number of readers in millions.
columns.Rank: The rank of the book based on ratings.

review.table_description: The table stores reviews and ratings for various books.
